amendment.description: To prohibit the Assistant Secretary of Homeland Security (Transportation Security Administration) from removing any item from the current list of items prohibited from being carried aboard a passenger aircraft.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4582 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4582 proposed by Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S7474, S7475, S7499; text: CR S7474) To prohibit the Assistant Secretary of Homeland Security (Transportation Security Administration) from removing any item from the current list of items prohibited from being carried aboard a passenger aircraft.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4582 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4582 proposed by Senator Clinton.
